macros.sourceContext:
| {{SVGRef}}{{Deprecated_Header}} > |

The v-ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for {{Glossary("glyphs")}} to achieve ideographic {{Glossary("baseline/typography", "baseline")}} alignment for vertically oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific {{SVGAttr("vert-origin-x")}} attribute.

^ |

You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:

|

title: v-ideographic
summary: The v-ideographic attribute indicates the alignment coordinate for glyphs to achieve ideographic baseline alignment for vertically oriented glyph layouts. The value is an offset in the font coordinate system relative to the glyph-specific vert-origin-x attribute.
pageTitle: v-ideographic - SVG: Scalable Vector Graphics | MDN
